HPI 8121 Nissan Skyline GT-R (R32) 1990 Hi-Land 300km (JTC Round 5) 3rd Place K. Shimizu/M. Kageyama

Purchased: 2015
Manufacturer page: http://www.hpimodelcar.com/en/line_up/index_8121.php

The Object T team started the 1990 season racing two Ford Sierra RS500s. For some reason the team swapped one of the RS500s for a Skyline for round 5 & 6. It probably had something to do with the fact that Skylines won the first 4 rounds that season. In fact, Skylines would win [i]every[/i] JTC race until the series ceased with the end of the 1993 season.

Kazuo Shimizu & Masahiko Kageyama drove this car to a 3rd place finish in Round 5 at Sendai raceway. You can see the car in action in the brief race highlights here: Group-A History 1985-1993 The Battle In Gr.A by Trampio/Toyo Tires - YouTube
